name: GEODE
goal:
The aim of this association is to facilitate and encourage the industrial and commercial
activities of its members.
Its objectives are therefore to:

a - develop and promote the activities of its members

b- promote and uphold the interests of its members especially within the European
Institutions

c - foster interchanges between the members so as to promote trade and the exchange of
information and so as to encourage them to give one another mutual support in the course
of their transactions or activities.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Energy, Environment, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
EU Initiative, policie and proposals of legislation in the energy sector on the following issues:
Electricity
Gas
District Heating and Cooling
Climate
Energy Efficiency
Transport
Smart Grids
Network Codes
